title: A Detective Named Abby: A Slice of Life
description: A delightful vignette offering a glimpse into the life of London Met Police Detective Abby Forthwright. A wry look at office politics that’s full of humor.“This is a really clever short story.”“Battling bureaucracy one bite at a time!”“I wanted to see what was inside this small package with a fantastic cover. It's a quick, fun read, Abby is an amusing character...”
author: Breezy Kinkade
